description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. XMAS Taxi is the sequel to "Astro Taxi", a 2D flying game where you have been engaged as the first pilot of the brand-new and experimental Astro Taxi (YEAH!). XMAS Taxi brings you 24 new levels, a wicked XMAS cap and the challenge to bring your customers right on time to their XMAS party
